name: Flop Chop
overview: Flop Chop is a game made in Basic for a contest organized by Sony back in 1985. You control a spherical character, which is actually an "ink tank", and has the ability to move in eight directions. The objective is to paint more tiles than your opponent in a limited time. If you manage to paint all of them your score will be higher. If you jump on top of your rival you will be thrown in any direction.
